Containers.Name: Duckdns-Dev
Containers.Description: Duckdns is a free dynamic DNS service hosted on Amazon VPC.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the duckdns configuration and log files will reside[br][br] Enter in the subdomains (comma separated, no spaces) and token in the advanced view. [br][br] Visit [b]www.duckns.org[/b] to register a domain and retrieve your token[br]
Containers.Overview: Duckdns is a free dynamic DNS service hosted on Amazon VPC. Unlike most other free dynamic DNS providers, DuckDNS accounts do not require periodic user action to keep them alive. Visit [b]www.duckdns.org[/b] to register your domain.
